title: RO Filter Renovation for Rural Schools
problem: Access to clean drinking water remains a critical need in many rural schools, where outdated or non-functional Reverse Osmosis (RO) systems put students' health at risk.
suggested_solution: Renovate and upgrade existing RO filtration units, ensuring safe and uninterrupted water access for schoolchildren and teaching staff.

title: Library Equipment & Management System for Rural Schools
problem: Many rural schools lack well-equipped libraries, limiting students' access to essential learning resources.
suggested_solution: Supply library furniture, shelving, digital cataloging systems, and basic reading materials alongside a user-friendly library management system.

title: Mangrove Mapping and Conservation Awareness Project
problem: Mangroves serve as vital coastal ecosystems that support biodiversity and protect against erosion, yet many remain undocumented or poorly preserved.
suggested_solution: Use GIS tools and community-led surveys to map mangrove forests, alongside educational workshops for mangrove conservation and sustainable environmental practices.
